Docs.summary: Allows the control serializer to get to the builder for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.IControlBuilderAccessor> interface defines the property a control must implement to allow a control serializer to access the control's builder. <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> implements this interface, so all controls deriving from <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> have an implementation of this property.

Docs.summary: Gets the control builder for this control.
Docs.value: The that built the control; otherwise, if no builder was used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.IControlBuilderAccessor.ControlBuilder%2A> property allows a control serializer to access the builder that built the control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IControlBuilderAccessor>.
